title.narrative: Eastern and North Central Provincial Road Project (formerly Road Network Project [Provincial Roads])

description.narrative: The Eastern and North Central Provincial Road Project (the Project) rehabilitated about 370 kilometers (km) of provincial roads in Eastern Province and North Central Province (NCP). Consulting services were provided to support project implementation, strengthening the project management capability of the Eastern Provincial Road Development Department (EPRDD) and North Central Provincial Road Development Authority (NCPRDA). Overall road sector management capacity in both provinces were enhanced by (i) modernizing the EPRDD office, and (ii) improving the capacity of EPRDD and NCPRDA to manage road assets.
